name: C.H.A.O.S. (Mewoooo)
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys 2021.2 jam. The goal is to park cars by tracing them a path towards their assigned parking slot. You gain one point for every car parked and lose two for every car that has an accident. You can press W to speed up the last car your mouse hovered over or S to slow it down. If your score goes under -5 you lose. You can either play the levels with a goal, meaning you have to get a certain number of points to win, or in endless mode, where you cannot win and instead are given a highscore. Hope you enjoy. Would be good if you read the guide in the main menu, on the right side of the screen before playing.

Hopefully all the exports work...

Sfx made with bfxr and sprites made with pixlr and pixilart
